content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) 
-  Chest (position (40.5, -83.5)) with coal
-  Chest (position (41.5, -83.5)) with coal
-  Burner inserter (position (39.5, -81.5)) 

### Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
-  Make sure the chest has enough items to extract before attempting extraction
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to drop items into it

### Errors when inserting items
-  Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them

### Errors when picking up entities
-  Ensure your inventory is not full before attempting to pick up an entity

### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before attempting to mine

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   Important variables:
    *   `wood`: int
    *   `coal`: int
    *   `stone`: int
    *   `iron-plate`: int
